title: Srimad Bhagavatam | HG Madhu Pandit Dasa | SB 1.7.27 | 17-01-2016
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.text: So this is a chapter titled the son of Drona punished, who is Ashwathama and all of a sudden
there was a great effulgence, dangerous effulgence, destructive effulgence spreading all around
and Krishna and Arjuna were discussing, where does it come from?
Arjuna was saying, where does it come from?
I do not understand.
So Supreme Lord replies that this is Brahmastra released by son of Drona and he does not know
how to retract the glare.
That is coming from this.
So that knowledge does not necessarily mean that you have to physically separate from
this body.
But those who use this knowledge and separate themselves by knowledge, they separate themselves
from the body.
They feel so much liberated that they utilize rest of their life in this body to give this
knowledge to others.
And make them also feel this liberating feeling of having come out of this misidentification
with this body.
So one who utilizes this life to chant these mantras, Hare Krishna, names of God, to do
japa, to do kirtana, have faith in the holy name.
Once he gets this detachment from this material body.
Then he does not live for the body, but he makes the body live for him.
Just like those who think they are this body, their soul is living for the body.
What I will do with the body, how I will secure my body, how I will give gratification for
my body, how I will feed my senses.
These are all the cinta of a person who is thinking I am the body.
And the thoughts of a person who is thinking I am not the body is that I, as a spirit soul,
I have a different purpose.
I have understood from the scriptures that the purpose of getting this human life is
to come out of this material world.
And therefore the shastras are given certain techniques, certain methods.
I should give this material life.
I should give this material life.
I should give this material life.
I should use this material life.
I should be able to utilize that body according to those principles and come out of this body.
So first, you get little knowledge, jana that I am not this body.
And then you get convinced that you should adopt spiritual practices given by Srila Prabhupada.
And then after you do those spiritual practices, slowly the knowledge becomes deeper and it
becomes vijjana or realized knowledge.

of the Lord. You get purified, no doubt. Many of you are chanting for such a long time.
That is why the next lesson is being given. Those who are not chanting at all, we tell
them chant Hare Krishna.
For those who are chanting Hare Krishna, we tell them, hear Hare Krishna. You are already

mantra also. Entire sixteen rounds you are thinking.
This matter, that matter, this matter, that matter, that matter, that matter, going on, going on, like Hare Krishna chanting has become a background music for your thinking.
All your material thinking you do that time.
You have to go to post office, you have to go to bank, you have to solve this problem, that problem, this financial problem, that problem, this personal problem.
Okay, this ambition, I can become this, I can, you know, all these things, oh, that, this, that, that, what will happen to this, something, something may happen here.
Oh, my God, oh, no, that was so nice, that experience was so nice, very nice, it was, you know, very, such a, that party was so good and everything was so nice.
Like this, oh, that should not have happened, you know, very sad thing, it should not have happened.

Your pathra was ulta.
How will the technology be effective?
Technology will not be effective.
Some indirect, little benefit you will get, because after all this is very powerful mantra.
Even in tongue you are chanting, it will have tremendous benefit.
All your papa and all will be blessed.

You will be burnt out, you will get lot of punya, but ultimately you need to get spiritual energy to get separated from this material body, get liberated from this material body, experience your true self as a, as amsa of Krishna, experience your true self as a bhakta of Krishna, as a lover of Krishna, experience true love of God, that all you cannot get if you go on doing like this.
You have to send the Hare Krishna Maha Mantra inside by attention.
For that you have to have intention that understanding that this shabda, this Krishna Nama is a samutra of Satchitananda.
In our life we are only seeking Sattva, Chitta and Ananda, even materially, but in the wrong direction.
Look for Satchitananda from the holy name, then pure Satchitananda will come.
In the material world, asat is being duplicated as sat, achit is duplicated as chit, ignorance is shown as, is masquerading as knowledge.
Material Ananda is masquerading as spiritual Ananda.
Material love is appearing to be like spiritual love, but no.
It is asat, achit, nirananda.
But what we are looking for is?
Sat, chit, ananda.
In material world, material activities, you will only get asat, achit and nirananda.
But if you send the Hare Krishna Maha Mantra inside and touch your soul, you will experience
Sat, chit and ananda, little by little.
So the biggest problem for hearing, biggest obstruction for hearing, who is that?
The mind.
The mind.
So there is a spiritual technology how to handle this mind.
You want to know?
Yes.
Ok.
Let's see what all the mind does.
Mind does problem solving.
Some problem is there.
During japa, your mind will be solving that problem.
Yes.
That is one activity.
What is it?
Problem solving.
Right?
Second, the mind also does planning.
I have some objective.
Ok, I will do this, I will do this, no, no, I will not do this, I will do this, I will
take this route, this route, planning.
Agreed?
Yes.
Let us try to understand what all mind does.
Yes.
At the end of it, I will say what, what mind should do.
That is objective.
So you should know what all you should not do.
So problem solving you should not do.
Planning you should not do.
Next, the mind does, there are four emotional things that the mind does.
One is the mind goes into future.
Yes.
And it dreams, is it not?
Oh, it will be so nice if I get that big job, so nice if that you know business transaction
goes through, oh feeling, then you are chanting Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna.
So dreaming, dreaming and chanting.
Problem solving and chanting.
Planning and chanting.
Dreaming and chanting.
Yes.
Another thing you do also, what is that? You worry and chant. Worry is about, oh, agatha ilva, oh, sikitha ilva, worry and chant, Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna, Krishna Krishna, Hare Krishna.
Actually you are not even connecting that worry to Hare Krishna. You are trying to solve that worry yourself. Intellectually, angmadana, ingmadana, atmadana, all these kinds of things.
Hare Krishna's solution to all problem is right there. You are not even connecting it. If you worry and connect to Hare Krishna, at least problem will really get solved.
So, even though that is not the best thing, Krishna knows how to solve our problem if you hear, if you respect the holy name and hear, he will clean everything.
So, worrying. So you should not do this worrying and dreaming and chanting.
Then something else you do is you go into the past. This is worrying and dreaming is future.
And then you go into the past. You are always, let's say something very nice happened. You are rejoicing.
Oh, Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna, Krishna Krishna, Krishna Krishna, Krishna Krishna, Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna, Krishna Krishna, Hare Hare, Hare Rama, Hare Rama, Rama Rama, like that.
Or some connection with that.
That is rejoicing.
Rejoicing the past.
And then, again in the past, something else you do. What is that? Lamenting.
Oh, that I spoiled everything. That is all gone, gone. What to do? Completely gone.
Oh, so nice, my friendship is broken with that person. This thing, that thing, I should not have told that.
I should not have spoken like that.
Like this, like this, lamenting.
And then you are chanting Hare Krishna.
Another thing you can do.
You are driving.
Heavy traffic.
Like this, like this, like this.
Then you are Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna, Krishna Krishna, Hare Hare, Hare Rama, Hare Rama, Rama.
Where?
You are going.
Where is your attention?
Driving.
In directing your senses.
So what is the next activity that the mind can do?
It can direct your senses into something else, into doing something else.
Mind can do something else also.
What is that?
Suppose you are playing tennis or table tennis.
Where is your mind?
On the ball.
Is it not?
Mind is on the ball.
Action.
Mind is on the action.
This is what mind should be doing during japa.
Doing what?
Action.
What action you are doing?
Chanting.

Is there a role for intelligence?
Yeah. Role for intelligence will automatically come. Spiritual intelligence will come automatically.
Now, whatever I have told now is, as I said, chanting is first standard. Now I have told

So, where is buddhi?
Right now, when you are in second standard, you chant and hear, chant and hear, do this
seva. Buddhi is in the background. What is that buddhi? It is buddhi which says that

now, what you are now hearing, everything, what I have told today's class, it will go
inside. Tomorrow, when you chant, it will be in your background. What is that? Buddhi.
Buddhi. With buddhi, you chant. But you don't have to consciously do it. You hear this ten
times.
Now, what I have told you, repeat it again and again.
Again and again, you repeat it during times which are not japa. These are the times you
can think during driving. Instead of doing japa, you can think about japa during driving.
During other things, you can do about all these things. So, more and more, you think
about now this japa knowledge, Krishna knowledge, Krishna katha. You hear all these things,
it goes into your subconscious mind.
Then, it will be in the background. Just like now, none of you are actually consciously
aware of the effect of AC in this hall. But you are enjoying. Right? So, like that, this
knowledge that you are getting about japa, about Krishna consciousness is just like inside
it will create an AC atmosphere.
Yes.
So, in the AC atmosphere, you do japa. This knowledge will support. This knowledge,
this knowledge, this intelligence. This intelligence will give meaning to your activity. Why I am

you start thinking, oh, Krishna is, you know, this is Krishna. Krishna is non-different
from his name. How is he non-different from his name? Then, gone. Your attention is gone
from hearing.
Hearing. Your attention has to be on hearing. In fact, Prabhupada says, you should not think,
you should not imagine Krishna's form also during japa. Why you are thinking of Krishna's
form during japa? Krishna says, I have come as Shabda. When I come as Shabda, you want
to see me as Rupa. You have no capacity to see me as Rupa. You need shuddha manas to
see Rupa in your mind.
When you are trying to think of Krishna, if that form has to be Krishna, then your mind
has to be pure. When Prabhupada thinks of Krishna's form, that is Krishna. When you think
of Krishna's form, that is not Krishna. That is in your mind. Krishna doesn't incarnate
there. When you think of... when you chant Hare Krishna or when anybody chants Hare
Krishna, even an offensive person, most sinful person chants Hare Krishna, Krishna has told,
I am there. This is the meaning of Kali Kale Krishna Nama Rupa Avatara. So we should take

attached to this Nama and it will be... it will take it as a greatest possession in my
life.
Of all the possession, the greatest possession I have got in my life is Hare Krishna, Hare

attached to that portion, become attached to it. See, we become attached to so many
things. So that is what the intelligence can do. Intelligence does not have a conscious
role. Conscious activity is chanting and hearing, chanting and hearing.
Now I told you about inspection. Now don't go into inspection consciousness only. Neither

Nice.
Hare Krishna Prabhu.
Yeah.
Prabhu, what is the difference between following Hare Krishna Mantra and constantly
concentrating on the Hare Krishna Mantra?
There are two types of… Following is concentration of doing. There are two kinds of concentration.
Suppose I give you one work, I will tell you concentrate on the work. Right? Then only,
otherwise you are doing two of those, like you are driving and chanting. I say no, no,
no. Concentrate on doing of chanting. Another is seeing concentration. That means, you know,
put your attention, just see this mic. Do not take your mic out of this corner. This
is another kind of concentration. In japa, you do not need this seeing concentration.
Japa is a doing. You need doing concentration. You understood? In fact, if you try to concentrate
on the mantra, what will happen? Concentrate means for long time, you have to hold your
attention there. Here, Hare Krishna, it is moving. You concentrate on Hare or on Krishna
or on Rama or… going on, Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna. How to concentrate?
So, it is… Japa is concentration on… Everyone repeat. Japa is concentration on…
Doing. Doing. Doing seva to nama. Just like, see, something, let us say, like this. Concentrate.
If I do not concentrate, it will fall off. Concentrate. Similarly, you are chanting Hare
Krishna. You are doing. What is that doing? Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna,
Hare Krishna. You are taking inside Hare Krishna. Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna, Hare
Krishna, Hare Hare. By hearing, you are taking Hare Krishna inside. So, you make sure that
your attention is on the doing and do not do anything else. Do not do processing. Do
not do process… solution, problem solving. Do not do lamenting. Do not do worrying. Do
not do rejoicing. Do not do dreaming. Do not do any other work. Only that work you do now,
that is concentration. Understood? So, two types of…
The soul does two things – doing and seeing. So, Japa is doing concentration and not seeing
concentration. Yes.
Hare Krishna Prabhu.
Yeah.
Prabhu, can we understand like that, if we are checking, that means already we have followed
the mantra?
Yes. That is why I said, following first one engagement. If you are checking, following
is involved already. So, if you check also, good. When you check, you are automatically
following.
So, is it only one activity or two activities – following and checking or means when we
are checking, already it is followed?
No. When you are checking, you are already following. One includes the other. Just like
a glass of water is included in the bucket. So, in the same way, if you are checking,
you automatically, you cannot check without following. Is it not?
